description: Fix compile errors: JOOQ classes missing for search_index table
steps: Step 1: Run ./gradlew generateJooq to generate missing JOOQ classes
Step 2: Verify SearchIndexRecord class exists in build/generated-src/jooq
Step 3: Verify SEARCH_INDEX table constant exists
Step 4: Run ./gradlew compileKotlin to verify no compilation errors

description: Fix compile errors: Missing AbstractMappingRepository import in SearchIndexRepository
steps: Step 1: Check imports in SearchIndexRepository.kt
Step 2: Add missing import for AbstractMappingRepository from common.persistence.repository
Step 3: Verify compilation succeeds

description: Fix compile errors: Missing NormalizedStringUtils in SearchIndexer
steps: Step 1: Locate or create NormalizedStringUtils utility class
Step 2: Ensure proper import in SearchIndexer.kt
Step 3: Verify compilation succeeds

description: Fix compile errors: Missing create/update methods in SearchIndexRepository
steps: Step 1: Review SearchIndexRepository methods
Step 2: Add missing create() and update() methods following repository pattern
Step 3: Verify SearchIndexer can call these methods
Step 4: Verify compilation succeeds

description: Application compiles and builds successfully
steps: Step 1: Run ./gradlew clean build
Step 2: Verify no compilation errors
Step 3: Verify build artifacts are created
Step 4: Check build/libs for generated JAR file

description: Application starts successfully with local profile
steps: Step 1: Run ./gradlew bootRun --args='--spring.profiles.active=local'
Step 2: Verify application starts without errors
Step 3: Check logs for successful initialization
Step 4: Access http://localhost:8080/ and verify homepage loads
Step 5: Stop application gracefully

description: Member section product detail page displays product information
steps: Step 1: Navigate to member section product detail page
Step 2: Verify product title is displayed
Step 3: Verify product description is displayed
Step 4: Verify product price is displayed (if applicable)
Step 5: Verify product metadata is shown

description: Member section product detail page displays product image
steps: Step 1: Navigate to member section product detail page
Step 2: Verify Product#image field is rendered on the page
Step 3: Verify image loads correctly if image path exists
Step 4: Verify fallback behavior if no image exists

description: Member section product detail page has professional visual design
steps: Step 1: Navigate to member section product detail page
Step 2: Take screenshot of the page
Step 3: Verify layout is clean and professional
Step 4: Verify typography is readable and well-spaced
Step 5: Verify color scheme matches site design
Step 6: Verify responsive design on different screen sizes

description: Member section landing page displays custom hero image
steps: Step 1: Navigate to member section landing page
Step 2: Check if /media/member-section-image.webp exists
Step 3: Verify hero image displays member-section-image.webp if it exists
Step 4: Verify fallback to /static/images/night-tree.webp if custom image doesn't exist

description: Member section landing page displays 'Moje produkty' heading
steps: Step 1: Navigate to member section landing page
Step 2: Verify heading 'Moje produkty' is present above product listing
Step 3: Verify heading is properly styled and visible
Step 4: Verify heading position is above the product cards

description: Member section landing page has attractive hero section with animations
steps: Step 1: Navigate to member section landing page
Step 2: Verify hero section contains animated elements (stars/lights)
Step 3: Verify animations are smooth and non-intrusive
Step 4: Verify animations enhance the calming/night theme aesthetic
Step 5: Take screenshot to verify visual appeal

description: Member section uses distinctive and memorable typography
steps: Step 1: Navigate to member section pages
Step 2: Verify unique display font is used for headings
Step 3: Verify readable body font complements display font
Step 4: Verify fonts are NOT generic (Inter, Roboto, Arial, system fonts)
Step 5: Verify font pairing creates cohesive aesthetic

description: Member section has cohesive color theme matching healthy sleep/relaxation aesthetic
steps: Step 1: Navigate to member section pages
Step 2: Verify color palette evokes calm/night/winter themes
Step 3: Verify dominant colors with sharp accents are used
Step 4: Verify CSS variables are used for color consistency
Step 5: Verify colors are NOT cliched (purple gradients on white)
Step 6: Take screenshots to verify color harmony

description: Member section has creative animations and micro-interactions
steps: Step 1: Navigate to member section pages
Step 2: Verify page load animations with staggered reveals
Step 3: Verify hover states on product cards
Step 4: Verify scroll-triggered animations if applicable
Step 5: Verify animations are CSS-based for performance
Step 6: Verify animations create memorable experience

description: Member section has unexpected and creative spatial composition
steps: Step 1: Navigate to member section pages
Step 2: Verify layout breaks from conventional grid patterns
Step 3: Verify asymmetry, overlap, or diagonal flow is present
Step 4: Verify generous negative space or controlled density
Step 5: Verify composition feels intentional and bold
Step 6: Take screenshots to verify unique layout approach

description: Member section has atmospheric backgrounds and visual depth
steps: Step 1: Navigate to member section pages
Step 2: Verify backgrounds use textures, gradients, or patterns (not solid colors)
Step 3: Verify visual depth through layering or shadows
Step 4: Verify backgrounds match calming/night aesthetic
Step 5: Verify creative effects like grain overlays or mesh gradients
Step 6: Take screenshots to verify atmospheric quality

description: Member section product cards have engaging visual effects
steps: Step 1: Navigate to member section product listing
Step 2: Hover over product cards to see hover effects
Step 3: Verify cards have depth (shadows, borders, or elevation)
Step 4: Verify transition animations are smooth
Step 5: Verify card design matches overall aesthetic
Step 6: Take screenshots of hover states

description: Member section is responsive across device sizes
steps: Step 1: Open member section on desktop viewport (1920px)
Step 2: Verify layout and all elements display correctly
Step 3: Resize to tablet viewport (768px)
Step 4: Verify responsive layout adapts appropriately
Step 5: Resize to mobile viewport (375px)
Step 6: Verify mobile layout is functional and attractive
Step 7: Test touch interactions on mobile

description: Member section creates unforgettable and distinctive user experience
steps: Step 1: Navigate through entire member section user journey
Step 2: Evaluate overall aesthetic coherence and boldness
Step 3: Verify design has clear conceptual direction
Step 4: Verify design differentiates from generic web patterns
Step 5: Verify design executes vision with precision and refinement
Step 6: Verify design creates one memorable moment/feature
Step 7: Take comprehensive screenshots documenting the experience
Step 8: Verify design matches healthy sleep/relaxing nights theme
Step 9: Verify NO generic AI aesthetics are present
Step 10: Confirm overall impression is professional and production-ready
